extendedInfo.description: Kids coloring cars is coloring application for kids consisting of 60 funny vehicle images such as cars, ships, motorbikes, boats, planes, etc. This app becomes attractive because each image is illustrated by an English vocabulary. Only by touching the screen, the words will be pronounced according to Oxford standard, which is very good for your kids. Scientists state that approaching by images and sounds is one of the most effective ways for kids to remember vocabulary more quickly and longer.As a result, we combine coloring and learning English vocabulary in Kids coloring cars. Surely, it brings interesting experiences to you and your babies. We will continuously update new words and images.Baby Boom always gives you the best things for your kidsâ growth.Keyword:Baby, child, children, education, polly, baby toys, kids toys, children's book, baby books, coloring games, coloring book, gifted education, infant,toddler, newborn, painting, sketch, picture games, coloring materials,free coloring,coloring pictures,color,color game,kids color,kids coloring,coloring for children,kids learn color,baby learn color,children learn color,coloring app,paint app,draw,kids draw,kids drawing,drawing for kids,creature,coloring princess,coloring page,kids dress game,kids games,paint,paint joy,painting doodle ,kids paint, game for kids, paint for childrens,coloring for kids,kids colring page,free coloring pages,kids coloring car,painting car,coloring transport,coloring transportation,kids learn english,coloring and learn english,kids coloring vehicle,coloring book vehicle,learn vocabulary english.
